:v: JasonKYi can now approve this pull request. To approve and merge a pull request, simply reply with `bors r+`. More detailed instructions are available [here](https://bors.tech/documentation/getting-started/#reviewing-pull-requests).

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/10759310333/job/29835833465)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/10759310333/job/29835833637)

There's a one-liner for this proof:

`fun x x  (hf x x).trans (mul_right_mono (coe_le_coe.2 h))`

Usually we take `IsEmpty` as a typeclass assumption.
```suggestion
lemma of_isEmpty [IsEmpty X] : HolderWith C r f := isEmptyElim
```

```suggestion
lemma holderWith_zero_iff : HolderWith 0 r f   x x, f x = f x := by
```

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat(Holder): basic lemmas for `HolderWith`
